reference.title: Lever Positioning for Engine Start
reference.shortdesc: Recommended spark and throttle lever settings for initiating vehicle engine operation.

section.title: Spark Lever Placement
section.p: Position spark lever at third or fourth notch on quadrant.
section.note: Avoid advancing spark lever too far to prevent engine "back kick".

section.title: Throttle Lever Placement
section.p: Open throttle lever approximately five or six notches.

section.title: Fine-Tuning Recommendations
section.p: Personal experience will help determine precise lever positioning for optimal engine start.
